amendment.description: An amendment, made in order by the rule, to prohibit the National Park Service from allocating any funds to designate the Canaveral National Seashore in Brevard County, Florida, as a "clothing-optional" area or nude beach.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weldon (FL) amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 396 - 25 (Roll no. 274).
